VersionId.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.

RegistryName.description: The name of the registry where the schema is stored. Either `SchemaArn` , or `SchemaName` and `RegistryName` has to be provided.

SchemaArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. Either `SchemaArn` , or `SchemaName` and `RegistryName` has to be provided.

SchemaName.description: The name of the schema. Either `SchemaArn` , or `SchemaName` and `RegistryName` has to be provided.

Schema.description: A wrapper structure to contain schema identity fields. Either `SchemaArn` , or `SchemaName` and `RegistryName` has to be provided.

description: The `AWS::Glue::SchemaVersion` is an AWS Glue resource type that manages schema versions of schemas in the AWS Glue Schema Registry.

Schema.description: The schema that includes the schema version.

SchemaDefinition.description: The schema definition for the schema version.
